p: The experimental mice were again separated into four groups ( n = 5). The dosing was carried out as in the anxiolytic section. After 30 min of dosing, each mouse was treated with thiopental-Na (40 mg/kg b.w.) orally to induce sleep. The time from administration of thiopental-Na to loss of righting reflex (latent period) and also the time of the loss and retrieval of righting reflex (duration of sleep) were observed. The onset time of sleeping and the total duration of sleeping were noted for each mouse [ 47].
